lobby.playerarea.playerareacell

Class PlayerAreaCellController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lobby.playerarea.playerareacell.PlayerAreaCellController

  • public class PlayerAreaCellController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a controller responsible for controlling a cell containing the information of a User.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    User

      • setUserAndLobby

        public void setUserAndLobby(User user,
                            Lobby lobby)
        Sets the User and Lobby and uses them to configure the view controlled by this controller.
        Parameters:
        user - the User whose information is shown in the cell controlled by this controller.
        lobby - the Lobby containing the ListView which in turn contains the view elements controlled by this
